paper_abstract: THIS ARTICLE DESCRIBES AN ANALYTICAL MODEL OF SYSTEMS THAT STORE AND MANIPULATE DATA. THE CACHE AND CODEC MODEL CAPTURES THE INTERPLAY BETWEEN TWO CENTRAL ASPECTS OF SUCH SYSTEMS: INFORMATION REPRESENTATION AND DATA-PROCESSING EFFICIENCY. THIS ARTICLE DESCRIBES THE MODEL AND EXPLORES DESIGN OPTIONS FOR SYSTEMS THAT INCORPORATE DATA ENCRYPTION AND COMPRESSION. IN EACH CASE STUDY, THE AUTHORS RAISE SEVERAL RESEARCH IMPLICATIONS AND DIRECTIONS FOR FUTURE RESEARCH.
paper_title: THE CACHE AND CODEC MODEL FOR STORING AND MANIPULATING DATA
